verses.verse: Now these are they that <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H6860>Ziklag<s%>, while he yet kept himself <S%H6113>close<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7027>Kish<s%>; and they were among the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%>, his <S%H5826>helpers<s%> in <S%H4421>war<s%>.

They were <S%H5401>armed<s%> with <S%H7198>bows<s%>, and could use both the right <S%H3231>hand<s%> and the <S%H8041>left<s%> in slinging <S%H68>stones<s%> and in shooting <S%H2671>arrows<s%> from the <S%H7198>bow<s%>: they were of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>'s <S%H251>brethren<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>.

The <S%H7218>chief<s%> was <S%H295>Ahiezer<s%>; then <S%H3101>Joash<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8094>Shemaah<s%> the <S%H1395>Gibeathite<s%>, and <S%H3149>Jeziel<s%>, and <S%H6404>Pelet<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5820>Azmaveth<s%>, and <S%H1294>Beracah<s%>, and <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H6069>Anathothite<s%>,

and <S%H3460>Ishmaiah<s%> the <S%H1393>Gibeonite<s%>, a mighty <S%H1368>man<s%> among the <S%H7970>thirty<s%>, and over the <S%H7970>thirty<s%>, and <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, and <S%H3166>Jahaziel<s%>, and <S%H3110>Johanan<s%>, and <S%H3107>Jozabad<s%> the <S%H1452>Gederathite<s%>,
Eluzai <S%H498><s%>, and <S%H3406>Jerimoth<s%>, and <S%H1183>Bealiah<s%>, and <S%H8114>Shemariah<s%>, and <S%H8203>Shephatiah<s%> the <S%H2741>Haruphite<s%>,
Elkanah <S%H511><s%>, and <S%H3449>Isshiah<s%>, and <S%H5832>Azarel<s%>, and <S%H3134>Joezer<s%>, and <S%H3434>Jashobeam<s%>, the <S%H7145>Korahites<s%>,
and <S%H3132>Joelah<s%>, and <S%H2069>Zebadiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3395>Jeroham<s%> of <S%H1446>Gedor<s%>.

And of the <S%H1425>Gadites<s%> there <S%H914>separated<s%> themselves unto <S%H1732>David<s%> to the <S%H4679>stronghold<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, <S%H2428>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H6635>valor<s%>, <S%H582>men<s%> trained for <S%H4421>war<s%>, that could <S%H6186>handle<s%> <S%H6793>shield<s%> and <S%H7420>spear<s%>; whose <S%H6440>faces<s%> were like the <S%H6440>faces<s%> of <S%H738>lions<s%>, and they were as <S%H4116>swift<s%> as the <S%H6643>roes<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>;
Ezer <S%H5829><s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%>, <S%H5662>Obadiah<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%>, <S%H446>Eliab<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%>,
Mishmannah <S%H4925><s%> the <S%H7243>fourth<s%>, <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H2549>fifth<s%>,
Attai <S%H6262><s%> the <S%H8345>sixth<s%>, <S%H447>Eliel<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh<s%>,
Johanan <S%H3110><s%> the <S%H8066>eighth<s%>, <S%H443>Elzabad<s%> the <S%H8671>ninth<s%>,
300 <S%H3414><s%> the <S%H6224>tenth<s%>, <S%H4344>Machbannai<s%> the <S%H6249>eleventh<s%>.

These of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> were <S%H7218>captains<s%> of the <S%H6635>host<s%>: <S%H259>he<s%> that was <S%H6996>least<s%> was equal to a <S%H3967>hundred<s%>, and the <S%H1419>greatest<s%> to a <S%H505>thousand<s%>.

These are they that went <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, when it had <S%H4390>overflowed<s%> all its <S%H1415>banks<s%>; and they put to <S%H1272>flight<s%> all them of the <S%H6010>valleys<s%>, both toward the <S%H4217>east<s%>, and toward the <S%H4628>west<s%>.
And there <S%H935>came<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%> to the <S%H4679>stronghold<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H6440>meet<s%> <S%H6030>them<s%>, and answered and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H935>them<s%>, If ye be come <S%H7965>peaceably<s%> unto me to <S%H5826>help<s%> <S%H3824>me<s%>, my heart shall be <S%H3162>knit<s%> unto <S%H7411>you<s%>; but if ye be come to betray me to mine <S%H6862>adversaries<s%>, seeing there is <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2555>wrong<s%> in my <S%H3709>hands<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of our <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H7200>look<s%> <S%H3198>thereon<s%>, and rebuke it.

Then the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> <S%H3847>came<s%> upon <S%H6022>Amasai<s%>, who was <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H7970>thirty<s%>, and he <S%H1732>said<s%>, Thine are we, David, and on thy <S%H1121>side<s%>, thou son of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%>: <S%H7965>peace<s%>, <S%H7965>peace<s%> be unto <S%H7965>thee<s%>, and peace be to thy <S%H5826>helpers<s%>; for thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5826>helpeth<s%> <S%H1732>thee<s%>. Then David <S%H6901>received<s%> <S%H5414>them<s%>, and made them <S%H7218>captains<s%> of the <S%H1416>band<s%>.

Of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> also there <S%H5307>fell<s%> away some to <S%H1732>David<s%>, when he <S%H935>came<s%> with the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> against <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%>: but they <S%H5826>helped<s%> them <S%H5633>not<s%>; for the lords of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> upon <S%H6098>advisement<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> him <S%H559>away<s%>, saying, He will <S%H5307>fall<s%> away to his <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to the jeopardy of our <S%H7218>heads<s%>.

As he <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H6860>Ziklag<s%>, there <S%H5307>fell<s%> to him of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, <S%H5734>Adnah<s%>, and <S%H3107>Jozabad<s%>, and <S%H3043>Jediael<s%>, and <S%H4317>Michael<s%>, and <S%H3107>Jozabad<s%>, and <S%H453>Elihu<s%>, and <S%H6769>Zillethai<s%>, <S%H7218>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands<s%> that were of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>.

And they <S%H5826>helped<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> against the <S%H1416>band<s%> of <S%H1368>rovers<s%>: for they were all mighty men of <S%H2428>valor<s%>, and were <S%H8269>captains<s%> in the <S%H6635>host<s%>.

For <S%H6256>from<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H3117>day<s%> men <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H5826>help<s%> <S%H1419>him<s%>, until there was a great <S%H4264>host<s%>, like the <S%H4264>host<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.

And these are the <S%H4557>numbers<s%> of the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of them that were <S%H2502>armed<s%> for <S%H6635>war<s%>, who <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>, to <S%H5437>turn<s%> the <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to <S%H6310>him<s%>, according to the word of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> that <S%H5375>bare<s%> <S%H6793>shield<s%> and <S%H7420>spear<s%> were <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>, <S%H2502>armed<s%> for <S%H6635>war<s%>.
Of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%>, mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor<s%> for the <S%H6635>war<s%>, <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and one <S%H3967>hundred<s%>.
Of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>.
And <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> was the <S%H5057>leader<s%> of the house of <S%H175>Aaron<s%>; and with him were <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>,

and <S%H6659>Zadok<s%>, a young <S%H5288>man<s%> <S%H1368>mighty<s%> of <S%H2428>valor<s%>, and of his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8269>captains<s%>.

And of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, the <S%H251>brethren<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>: for hitherto the <S%H4768>greatest<s%> part of them had <S%H8104>kept<s%> their <S%H4931>allegiance<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>.

And of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>, <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor<s%>, <S%H8034>famous<s%> men in their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses<s%>.

And of the half-tribe2677, 4294 of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H8083>eighteen<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>, who were <S%H5344>mentioned<s%> by <S%H8034>name<s%>, to <S%H935>come<s%> and make <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%>.

And of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%>, men that had <S%H998>understanding<s%> of the <S%H6256>times<s%>, to <S%H3045>know<s%> what <S%H3478>Israel<s%> ought to <S%H6213>do<s%>, the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of them were two <S%H3967>hundred<s%>; and all their <S%H251>brethren<s%> were at their <S%H6310>commandment<s%>.

Of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%>, such as were able to go <S%H3318>out<s%> in the <S%H6635>host<s%>, that could <S%H6186>set<s%> the <S%H4421>battle<s%> in <S%H3627>array<s%>, with all manner of instruments of <S%H4421>war<s%>, <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>, and that could <S%H5737>order<s%> the battle <S%H3820>array<s%>, and were not of double <S%H3820>heart<s%>.

And of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H8269>captains<s%>, and with them with <S%H6793>shield<s%> and <S%H2595>spear<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>.

And of the <S%H1839>Danites<s%> that could <S%H6186>set<s%> the <S%H4421>battle<s%> in <S%H6242>array<s%>, twenty and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>.
And of <S%H836>Asher<s%>, such as were able to go <S%H3318>out<s%> in the <S%H6635>host<s%>, that could <S%H6186>set<s%> the <S%H4421>battle<s%> in <S%H705>array<s%>, forty <S%H505>thousand<s%>.

And on the other <S%H5676>side<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, of the <S%H7206>Reubenites<s%>, and the <S%H1425>Gadites<s%>, and of the <S%H2677>half<s%> - <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, with all manner of <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H6635>war<s%> for the <S%H6635>battle<s%>, a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>.

All these being <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>, that could <S%H5737>order<s%> the battle <S%H4634>array<s%>, <S%H935>came<s%> with a <S%H8003>perfect<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>, to make <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> over all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and all the <S%H7611>rest<s%> also of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%> to make <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%>.

And they were there with <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, <S%H398>eating<s%> and <S%H8354>drinking<s%>; for their <S%H251>brethren<s%> had made preparation for <S%H3559>them<s%>.

Moreover they that were <S%H7138>nigh<s%> unto <S%H3485>them<s%>, even as far as Issachar and <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> and <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>, <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> on <S%H2543>asses<s%>, and on <S%H1581>camels<s%>, and on <S%H6505>mules<s%>, and on <S%H1241>oxen<s%>, <S%H3978>victuals<s%> of <S%H7058>meal<s%>, <S%H1690>cakes<s%> of <S%H6778>figs<s%>, and clusters of raisins, and <S%H3196>wine<s%>, and <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and <S%H1241>oxen<s%>, and <S%H6629>sheep<s%> in <S%H7230>abundance<s%>: for there was <S%H8057>joy<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
